Klant explores around some more. Printing out a map on the computer. (All b=
ots need a map of their base) He explores some more, until he comes to the =
Brig. He looks around the Brig. He comes to the prison cells, and looks at =
the prisoners. There were some thug looking guys, (To him they look like th=
at, don't jump on me!) and one bot bleeding a huge puddle on the floor. It =
made him sick so he turned around. He seen a gas. From the CR Room! He avoi=
ded it as best he could and got in. He seen Rex. He started dragging Rex to=
 a CR Chamber. He put him in.

"Hope you do okay, I'll catch the one who di=
d it, buddy." Klant says. He goes to his ship and gets a device to protect =
him from the gas, and then grabs a first aid kit, and something he conceals=
 in his hand. He heads back to the room. He throws a handful of powder in t=
he room, which would coat BrightBlade and make her seeable. He gets covered=
 in powder and looks around the room for the intruder...
